channel.title: Doug's Lensflare Game Development Blog
channel.description: These are Doug's bloggish thoughts on game development, specifically on the games he's writing for Lensflare, or on Lensflare-related topics more generally. Or whatever he wants to write here, really, but those are the sorts of things to expect.

item.title: First Post
item.description: First Post of the Lensflare Blog
